name: StockSignals
0:
”Alexa, open Stock Signals”
”tell me about A.A.P.L”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stock signals
des:
Stock Signals provides buy/sell signals based on complex technical trading algorithm. The trading model is specifically designed for swing traders. Most signals have a duration of 3 to 10 days. 

To open the skill say, "Alexa, open Stock Signals"
To get the signal for a specific ticker, you have to say the Symbol of the ticker. For example, if you want to check the signal for Apple Inc. you have to say, "A.A.P.L". The response to this will be Buy, Sell or Sold.

The Skill is free to use for the fist seven days after interacting with the skill for the first time. After seven days you will have to buy the monthly subscription. You can cancel it anytime in between. 

Amazing Returns: Last 28,519 trades had an average return of 2.0%

Visit us at https://www.missingstep.com/ for more information.

*All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security or financial product does not guarantee future results or returns. Keep in mind that while diversification may help spread risk, it does not assure a profit or protect against loss. There is always the potential of losing money when you invest in securities or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing. The price of a given security may increase or decrease based on market conditions and customers may lose money, including their original investment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
